title: WP Fastest Cache plugin bug exposes 600K WordPress sites to attacks
description: The WordPress plugin WP Fastest Cache is vulnerable to an SQL injection vulnerability that could allow unauthenticated attackers to read the contents of the site's database. [...]

title: New Reptar CPU flaw impacts Intel desktop and server systems
description: Intel has fixed a high-severity CPU vulnerability in its modern desktop, server, mobile, and embedded CPUs, including the latest Alder Lake, Raptor Lake, and Sapphire Rapids microarchitectures. [...]

title: VMWare discloses critical VCD Appliance auth bypass with no patch
description: VMware disclosed a critical and unpatched authentication bypass vulnerability affecting Cloud Director appliance deployments. [...]

title: New CacheWarp AMD CPU attack lets hackers gain root in Linux VMs
description: A new software-based fault injection attack, CacheWarp, can let threat actors hack into AMD SEV-protected virtual machines by targeting memory writes to escalate privileges and gain remote code execution. [...]

title: LockBit ransomware exploits Citrix Bleed in attacks, 10K servers exposed
description: The Lockbit ransomware attacks use publicly available exploits for the Citrix Bleed vulnerability (CVE-2023-4966) to breach the systems of large organizations, steal data, and encrypt files. [...]

title: Microsoft November 2023 Patch Tuesday fixes 5 zero-days, 58 flaws
description: Today is Microsoft's November 2023 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for a total of 58 flaws and five zero-day vulnerabilities. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes critical Azure CLI flaw that leaked credentials in logs
description: Microsoft has fixed a critical security vulnerability that could let attackers steal credentials from GitHub Actions or Azure DevOps logs created using Azure CLI (short for Azure command-line interface). [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5032190 update enables Moment 4 features for everyone
description: Microsoft has released the KB5032190 cumulative update to fix security vulnerabilities in Windows 11. This is the first Patch Tuesday update with access to Windows 11 Moment 4 features, provided you turn on the "Get latest updates" toggle. [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5032189 update released with 11 improvements
description: Microsoft has released the KB5032189 cumulative update for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 10 22H2, which contains eleven fixes for various issues. [...]

title: Pharmacy provider Truepill data breach hits 2.3 million customers
description: Postmeds, doing business as 'Truepill,' is sending notifications of a data breach informing recipients that threat actors accessed their sensitive personal information. [...]

title: Meet the Unique New "Hacking" Group: AlphaLock
description: A Russian hacking group known as AlphaLock is launching a "pentest" marketplace and training platform to empower a new generation of threat actors. Learn more from Flare about the new hacking group. [...]
